page.title: 19THE OPENING OF THE BY_PASS
page.content: Some people have not welcomed the opening of the Hatch Beauchamp by_pass.One garage has closed down because of a reduction in trade and one shop has also closed. But most of the people who live by the once congested A358,are in favour of the new by_pass. Now, Hatch Beauchamp is quieter and the risk of accidents caused by heavy traffic has been reduced considerably. As the village is quieter more people may come to live here and perhaps we shall have improved facilities as a result. Already a house is being built on the site of the garage and there are plans to build fifty new houses. In general, most of the people in Hatch Beauchamp think that the opening of the new road has improved the village and the quality of village life.
